text.title: Shaoxing

p.s:
( 绍兴 ) is a city in
Zhejiang
, near
Shanghai
and
Hangzhou
, famous for its traditional Chinese bridges , boats , architectures , yellow wine and a huge number of textile and cloth factories and production .
The fastest way to get there is by plane , stop in Xiaoshan International Airport ( XIA ) , then take a bus or cab to get into downtown , no more than 20 km away from the airport .
The easiest way to get into Shaoxing is by bus , almost every city in Zhejiang will have transportation to Shaoxing .
The downtown is very clean , and very nice to walk around to feel the perfect combination of modern and ancient Chinese culture
Fishermen in this town used to use cormorants ( 鸬鹚 ) for fishing , but nowadays the town only has the birds on special occasions .
Call the travel association ahead of time to ask before coming here to look for birds .
